citances.sentence:
26 Particulars of the default and the money allegedly due as set out in Mr Robinson's affidavit (paragraph 18) are as follows:-
Principal sum $400,000 Interest 10% p/a from 27 April --- 10 October 2008 at $109.58/day x 1688 days $184,971.04
Total $584,971.04 Less s.86 Bankruptcy Act set-off (decision Federal Court of Australia Nishtom Pty Limited v Robinson (2007) FCA 978 $119,646.44
